## transformMVP variable

Inline function. Multiplies `pos` with given model, view &amp; projection matrices (in order). `p` is extended to a vec4.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transformMVP: (p: Vec3Term, model: Mat4Term, view: Mat4Term, proj: Mat4Term) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Op2<"vec4">
```
